title: End of term 1 holidays
content:
well it's that time again (it's the end of term 1 4 me) therefore i must leave you (not permanently) but just 4 1 week, i will b back on the 29 of march maby sooner but i don't know

enjoy your holidays & i will c u keeners soon
cheers

title: Re: End of term 1 holidays
content:
